Package index

Import fonts

Functions to import fonts

import_barlow() import_inter() import_lato() import_nunito() import_plex()
Import font for use in ggplot2 graphs

Use custom ggplot2 theme

Use ggplot2 theme with custom style and font

plummy()
Custom ggplot2 theme

Color palettes

Custom color palettes

palette_tableau()
20 color qualitative color palette from tableau
scale_colour_tableau() scale_color_tableau() scale_fill_tableau()
Discrete color & fill scales based on the tableau palette
palette_strong()
17 color qualitative color palette from strong
scale_colour_strong() scale_color_strong() scale_fill_strong()
Discrete color & fill scales based on the strong palette
palette_morris()
10 color qualitative color palette from morris
scale_colour_morris() scale_color_morris() scale_fill_morris()
Discrete color & fill scales based on the morris palette
palette_okabeito()
8 color qualitative color palette from okabeito
scale_colour_okabeito() scale_color_okabeito() scale_fill_okabeito()
Discrete color & fill scales based on the okabeito palette

Use custom ggplot2 theme

Low level ggplot2 themes

theme_grid_barlow() theme_grid() theme_grid_inter() theme_grid_lato() theme_grid_nunito() theme_grid_plex()
ggplot2 grid theme.
